content.fact1: The Census count determines our federal representation. An undercount could cost California to lose a seat in Congress.
content.fact2: Every single completed census means $20,000 for schools, medical care, children and families, transportation, and housing.
content.fact3: Un conteo bajo tendría graves consecuencias para el Condado de Alameda. ¡El Censo 2020 requerirá que nos unamos para asegurar que todos sean contados!
